name: Tank Ace Shooter!!!
description:
You are the TANK ACE!!!

In game tutorial available.

WASD/ARROW keys to move, mouse to aim, left click to fire. 30% speed in reverse.
Try to take out all enemy tank ace shooters from within your designated area of engagement without getting detected. Do it all within the mission time frame. Getting shot just once will get you killed.

Note* this web version is not ad or purchase supported, but you may upgrade your ACE by replaying levels and getting the cash reward for that level as many times as you like.
